data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 2
data.actual_result: It is clickable and you can create a channel with no options.
data.expected_result: The create button should have a disabled state (same as the Desktop app).
data.short_description: Create channel button for new private channel without options is clickable/enabled
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the + button next to a category to create a new channel - In the new menu toogle the option to make the channel private - Make sure that no role is selected for the private channel option - Observe the create channel button in the top right corner
